Solutions for Stats Lab 4 (Week 12): SPOILER ALERT 2.1 Exercise 1 2.2 Exercise 2 2.3 Exercise 3 2.4 Exercise 4

Solutions for Stats Lab 4 (Week 12): SPOILER ALERT 2.1 Exercise 1 library(ggpubr) data(mtcars) mtcars$cyl <- as.factor(mtcars$cyl) mtcars$am <- as.factor(mtcars$am) ggboxplot(mtcars, x = "cyl", y = "disp") 2.2 Exercise 2 ggboxplot(mtcars, x = "cyl", y = "mpg", fill = "am") 2.3 Exercise 3 ggbarplot(mtcars, x = "am", y = "mpg", fill = "cyl", position = position_dodge(1), add = "mean_sd") 2.4 Exercise 4 ggbarplot(mtcars, x = "cyl", y = "mpg", color = "cyl", position = position_dodge(1), add = "mean") 2.4.1 Exercise 5 ggbarplot(mtcars, x = "cyl", y = "wt", fill = "am", position = position_dodge(0.5), add = "mean_sd")
